marginalia.anchor_text: Iohannes Breton, episcopus Herefordensis, qui admodum peritus in iuribus Anglicanis, librum de eis conscripsit, qui vocatur le Bretoun

position.marginalia_text: Briton, qui libru[m] de legibus Anglia[e] scripsit, fuit Episcopus Herefordensis

marginalia.translation: John de Breton, who wrote the book Britton, was bishop of Hereford.

underline.text: Obijt hoc anno Iohannes Breton, episcopus Herefordensis, qui admodum peritus in iuribus Anglicanis, librum de eis conscripsit, qui vocatur le Bretoun
